name: Is The Liar, A Game?
description:
A game solely made for the Community Game Jam. It is a very, very short game and if you're in for a long adventure, I'll tell you that this game isn't going to do that for you (I'm sorry).

I will now apologize if you played the game and noticed some glitches and whatnot within the gameplay and all. It is my first time joining a game jam, and I think the timing wasn't right to let me really polish and plan it all out, but I don't want to miss this chance so I made the game even with a hectic schedule (y'know, college and stuff).

I did all the graphics, sound, code, except for the font called 'SH Pincher' made by Tinghao Hu.
